instruction.description: You have the option to choose between different types, including bug reports, user stories, tasks, or documentation. Each type serves a specific purpose and comes with its own unique context and structure. The content generated will be in markdown format, ensuring compatibility with various tools and platforms - ie. Jira, Confluence, etc.
instruction.title: Create Scrum Content
form.select.hint: Select prompt type in order to create content
form.select.title: Prompt type
